adDetails: Hi, we offer a full range of Residential home cleaning services, and janitorial cleaning services. Call today for a free estimate. Cleaning Services * Houses,Apartments,Condos,Studios,Move-in and Move-out * Weekly, Bi-weekly, Tri-weekly, Monthly * One time/ Special occasions * Spring cleaning * Move In / Move Out OUR SERVICE INCLUDE BUT NOT LIMITED: Kitchen - Wash sink - Clean counter tops - Wipe cabinets - Wipe outside of appliances - Sweep and mop floor - Load and run dishwasher - Clean microwave inside/out - Take out trash Bathroom(s) - Clean and disinfect tub, toilet, shower, and sink - Sweep and mop floor - Clean mirrors - Change towels Other Areas - Dust furniture, pictures - Vacuum/mop floors - Dust window blinds - Clean television screens - Wipe wood tables/chairs Bedroom(s) - Dust - Change sheets/ Make bed - Floors Extras (But NO extra charge) - - - Clean outside of oven - Clean outside of refrigerator. My prices are depending on how big your home Feel Free to contact House cleaning services to schedule an appointment or to get a free estimate PHONE show contact info ask for Nohemi! Thank you.
